Delivered regular updates and enhancements based on user feedback to keep the system aligned with business needs.

work.title: Staff Software Engineer - Remote
listItems: Enhanced system stability and maintainability by implementing CI/CD pipeline tools, including PMD Analyzer, automated regression testing, and pull request code scanning.

Applied a continuous refactoring approach to resolve legacy issues and align the codebase with modern best practices.
